name: Consecrate
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You consecrate the touched creature or object, making it proof against evil. Fiends can't move within 30 feet of the consecrated creature or object, and take 4d6 radiant damage if they start their turn within 30 feet of the consecrated creature or object. The target additionally gains 10 temporary hit points at the start of each of its turns and is immune to unholy and psychic damage.

The duration is one minute if cast on a creature, and until dispelled if cast on an object. The spell ends immediately if the target is reduced to 0 or fewer hit points.
empower: The consecrated target is so holy that all creatures other than you within 5 feet of the target take 2d6 radiant damage at the start of their turn.
